Self.Wiki: Determines the configuraiton of magic spells.

yesNoDialogMessageId.Wiki: The text ID of to use for the 'Yes / No' dialog issued when this spell is used.

limitCancelSpEffectId.Wiki: If the specified SpEffect is active on the player, then usage restrictions for this spell are ignored.

sortId.Wiki: The numeric ID used for ordering each spell in menus.

refId.Wiki: The call ID to used to specific the Attack, Bullet or SpEffect this spell uses when triggered.

mp.Wiki: The MP consumption of this spell when triggered.

stamina.Wiki: The stamina consumption of this spell when triggered.

iconId.Wiki: The numeric ID used for specifying which icon is used to display this spell in menus.

behaviorId.Wiki: The behavior parameter to use when this spell is triggered.

mtrlItemId.Wiki: The item (or items) that the spell costs in a shop that must be present before it can be purchased.

replaceMagicId.Wiki: The new magic row ID to use when the specified state info is invoked.

maxQuantity.Wiki: The number of uses this spell allows when equipped before requiring a bonfire reset.

heroPoint.Wiki: The amount of humanity this spell consumes when triggered.

overDexterity.Wiki: The maximum value of dexterity over start value.

sfxVariationId.Wiki: The offset to apply to the SFX ID invoked in the TAE event.

slotLength.Wiki: The number of spell equipment slots this spell occupies.

requirementIntellect.Wiki: The minimum amount of intelligence (INT) this spell requires for a valid cast.

requirementFaith.Wiki: The minimum amount of faith (FTH) this spell requires for a valid cast.

analogDexiterityMin.Wiki: The minimum value of dexterity (DEX) to start scaling the cast animation with (via the TimeAct event).

analogDexiterityMax.Wiki: The maximum value of dexterity (DEX) to stop scaling the cast animation with (via the TimeAct event).

ezStateBehaviorType.Wiki: The magic school this spell belongs to.

refCategory.Wiki: The parameter type to use for the call ID.

spEffectCategory.Wiki: The SpEffect category this spell belongs to

refType.Wiki: The TimeAct offset used in the c0000 TAE to find the casting animations.

opmeMenuType.Wiki: The type of menu to display when the spell is used.

hasSpEffectType.Wiki: The state info value that triggers the state info switch for this spell, changing the magic row ID it uses.

replaceCategory.Wiki: Additional conditions when switching the spell due to a state info switch occuring.

useLimitCategory.Wiki: The usage categories that this spell will be blocked by if SpEffect with the same category are present.

vowType0.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used while in no covenant.

vowType1.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used while in Way of White covenant.

vowType2.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used while in Princess Guard covenant.

vowType3.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used while in Warrior of Sunlight covenant.

vowType4.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used while in Darkwraith covenant.

vowType5.AltName: Vow Type: Path of the Dragon
vowType5.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used while in Path of the Dragon covenant.

vowType6.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used while in Gravelord Servant covenant.

vowType7.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used while in Forest Hunter covenant.

enable_multi.Wiki: If ON, then the spell can be used in multiplayer sessions.

enable_multi_only.Wiki: If ON, then the spell can be used in multiplayer sessions, but not in offline sessions.

isEnchant.Wiki: If ON, this spell is considered a weapon enhancement spell.

isShieldEnchant.Wiki: If ON, this spell is considered a shield enhancement spell.

enable_live.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used in a sessions where the player is the host.

enable_gray.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used in a sessions where the player is a gray phantom.

enable_white.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used in a sessions where the player is a white phantom.

enable_black.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used in a sessions where the player is a black phantom.

disableOffline.Wiki: If ON, this spell is disabled if the player is not in a multiplayer session.

castResonanceMagic.Wiki: If ON, this spell will broadcast resonance across multiplayer sessions (i.e. white rings) that empower the spell.

vowType15.Wiki: If ON, this spell is associated with the covenant in slot 15.
